name: TreatmentInterventionPreferencesGrouping
title: Treatment Intervention Preferences Grouping
description: The intention for this Grouping Value Set is to collect a broad range of member value sets which cover treatment intervention preferences for a wide range of illness or other health scenarios.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set includes concepts representing an individual's treatment intervention preferences which can be expressed by the individual in his or her advance care plan.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this value set is to identify treatment intervention preferences that may be relevant and could be considered by clinicians when making a treatment/care plan for the person.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include member value sets for treatment intervention preferences expressed for a variety of use cases and health scenarios.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
